body_html:
Try compiling without:
-Dtensorflow_WIN_CPU_SIMD_OPTIONS=/arch:AVX

I only managed to compile with SIMD after doing some code changes in kernel classes, haven't tried 1.3 but would not surprised if the issue is still there.

Cheers,
Ralf

body:
Try compiling without:
-Dtensorflow_WIN_CPU_SIMD_OPTIONS=/arch:AVX

I only managed to compile with SIMD after doing some code changes in kernel classes, haven't tried 1.3 but would not surprised if the issue is still there.

Cheers,
Ralf
